directions: Mix tuna,  diced tomato, jalapeno with liquid, broccoli, pesto, garlic, chives, and cayenne pepper in a bowl. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Mix well and top with seasoned croutons.
Assemble sandwiches by layering lettuce leaves, sliced tomato, and tuna mixture between sliced bread.
ingredients: 2 (5 ounce) cans tuna in water, drained
2 tablespoons canned sliced jalapeno peppers with juice
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Maggie's Spicy Tuna Sandwich
